text:
Hi, I am in the HubSpot Developers Bootcamp. I don't see a specific channel for the bootcamp. Is anyone aware of one?
Maybe someone can help me here, I am trying to set up my Dev Environment and Visual Studio but I am having some trouble.

I am following the "Setting Up Your Personal Development Environment" in the HubSpot Academy but I don't see an option to create an html file under source in my view.


HubSpot's academy image on the left and then my image.. I am a beginner so sorry for a very elementary question. I appreciate the help!
The channel is <#C068HSP0K38|> - it is a private channel so send a dm to <@U01QVR44MEY> and he'll give you access
